name: smartc
description: C Compiler for smart contracts on Signum network
author: Rui Deleterium

scripts.build:stable: npm run build && rm -Rf ../stable||: && mkdir ../stable && cp -R ./lib index.html style.css ./3rd-party favicon.svg ../stable/ && npm run build:docs && echo 'Sucess'
scripts.build:docs: rm -Rf ../stable/htmlDocs||: && npx markdown-folder-to-html ../docs && mv ../_docs ../stable/htmlDocs && ln -s ./README.html ../stable/htmlDocs/index.html && rm ../stable/htmlDocs/contents.json
